mapper.sql: PK_ASSET_TYPE, PK_ASSET_PROP, IS_VIEW, NEED_VALUE, COLLECT_TYPE, DISPLAY_IDX, DISPLAY_PRIORITY, COME_FROM
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from am_asset_type_prop
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into am_asset_type_prop (PK_ASSET_TYPE, PK_ASSET_PROP, IS_VIEW, NEED_VALUE, COLLECT_TYPE, DISPLAY_IDX, DISPLAY_PRIORITY, COME_FROM) values (#{pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{collectType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{displayIdx,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{displayPriority,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT})

insert into am_asset_type_prop
PK_ASSET_TYPE,
PK_ASSET_PROP,
IS_VIEW,
NEED_VALUE,
COLLECT_TYPE,
DISPLAY_IDX,
DISPLAY_PRIORITY,
COME_FROM,

mapper.update:
update am_asset_type_prop
PK_ASSET_TYPE = #{record.pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_ASSET_PROP = #{record.pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_VIEW = #{record.isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
NEED_VALUE = #{record.needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
COLLECT_TYPE = #{record.collectType,jdbcType=CHAR},
DISPLAY_IDX = #{record.displayIdx,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DISPLAY_PRIORITY = #{record.displayPriority,jdbcType=CHAR},
COME_FROM = #{record.comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

update am_asset_type_prop set PK_ASSET_TYPE = #{record.pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PK_ASSET_PROP = #{record.pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_VIEW = #{record.isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, NEED_VALUE = #{record.needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, COLLECT_TYPE = #{record.collectType,jdbcType=CHAR}, DISPLAY_IDX = #{record.displayIdx,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DISPLAY_PRIORITY = #{record.displayPriority,jdbcType=CHAR}, COME_FROM = #{record.comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT}

update am_asset_type_prop
IS_VIEW = #{isView,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
NEED_VALUE = #{needValue,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
COLLECT_TYPE = #{collectType,jdbcType=CHAR},
DISPLAY_IDX = #{displayIdx,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DISPLAY_PRIORITY = #{displayPriority,jdbcType=CHAR},
COME_FROM = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where PK_ASSET_TYPE = #{pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR} and PK_ASSET_PROP = #{pkAssetProp,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`PK_ASSET_PROP` FROM `am_asset_type_prop` a WHERE a.`PK_ASSET_TYPE`=#{id}
